item.title: Unstoppable with NBK: Ram Charan‚Äôs unknown act of kindness wins hearts - 123telugu
item.description:
Ram Charan's Heartwarming Act of Kindness on Unstoppable with NBK

Publication Date: Latest Telugu cinema news

Megapower Star Ram Charan is celebrated not just for his acting but also for his altruistic actions, which often go unnoticed. Recently, an episode of Unstoppable with NBK showcased a touching story of his support to a devoted fan who faced personal challenges.

  • Ram Charan learned about a fan from Chittoor district, who regularly donates blood and was struggling due to his wife's illness.
  • Charan and his wife Upasana arranged for free medical treatment for the fan's wife at a prominent hospital in Hyderabad.
  • She received ICU care for 17 days, with daily visits from specialists, all covered by Ram Charan.
  • The fan expressed his gratitude and shared his emotional journey during the latest episode, which went viral on social media.
‚ÄúCharan‚Äôs act of kindness reflects his genuine love for his fans and leaves a lasting impact.‚Äù

Ram Charan's kind gesture has not only helped a fan in need but also reinforced his reputation as a compassionate star.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' box office collection day 44: The Allu Arjun starrer makes less than the new films 'Emergency' - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2 box office collection day 44: The Allu Arjun starrer makes less than the new films 'Emergency', 'Azaad' on Friday; crosses Rs 1200 crore

Date: Not specified | Source: Times of India

The film 'Pushpa 2' has managed to cross Rs 1200 crore but has performed less than new releases 'Emergency' and 'Azaad' on Friday.

  • 'Pushpa 2' reaches a significant milestone of Rs 1200 crore in its box office collection.
  • The film's performance was lower than that of new releases.
  • The competition from newly released films is affecting 'Pushpa 2's audience turnout.
'Pushpa 2's collection indicates a robust performance yet highlights the challenges posed by new entrants in the market.'

The continued success of 'Pushpa 2' demonstrates the strong fanbase of Allu Arjun, but it also reflects changing box office dynamics with new competitors on the rise.

item.title: NBK, Jr NTR pay tributes to NTR on death anniversary - Greatandhra
item.description:
Tributes Paid to N.T. Rama Rao on 28th Death Anniversary

Publication Date: January 18, 2024 Source: Great Andhra

Tollywood actors N. Balakrishna, Jr NTR, and Kalyan Ram paid tributes to former Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister N. T. Rama Rao on his 28th death anniversary at NTR Ghat in Hyderabad.

  • Jr NTR and Kalyan Ram laid wreaths at their grandfather's samadhi.
  • Balakrishna honored his father, recognizing his contributions as a leader and actor.
  • Tributes emphasized NTR's dedication to the welfare of the poor and his political influence.
  • Andhra Pradesh Minister Nara Lokesh also paid respects, recalling NTR's reforms.
  • Calls for NTR to receive the Bharat Ratna award were noted.
‚ÄúNTR was not only the greatest actor but also dedicated himself to serving people, especially the poor and downtrodden.‚Äù - Balakrishna

The tributes commemorated NTR's lasting legacy in both cinema and politics, highlighting his impact on Telugu self-respect and governance.

item.title: NBK, Jr NTR pay tributes to NTR on death anniversary.. - Greatandhra
item.description:
Balakrishna, Jr NTR pay tributes to NTR on death anniversary

Date: January 18, 2024 Source: Great Andhra

On the 28th death anniversary of N. T. Rama Rao, Tollywood actors N. Balakrishna and Jr NTR paid floral tributes at NTR Ghat in Hyderabad, commemorating his legacy as an actor and leader.

  • Jr NTR was joined by Kalyan Ram to lay wreaths at their grandfather's samadhi.
  • Balakrishna emphasized NTR's dedication to serving the poor and his impactful political legacy.
  • Minister Nara Lokesh also paid his tributes, advocating for NTR to receive India's highest civilian award.
Balakrishna remarked, "NTR was not only the greatest actor but dedicated himself to serving people, especially the poor and downtrodden."

This year's tribute saw a significant gathering of fans, highlighting NTR's lasting impact on Telugu culture and politics.

item.title: Sankranthiki Vasthunam Box Office Collections: Venky starrer continues its Blockbuster run - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Sankranthiki Vasthunam Box Office Collections: Venky Starrer Continues Its Blockbuster Run

Published on: Jan 18, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

The film Sankranthiki Vasthunam is on track to cross Rs. 100 crore in the Telugu states, with projections exceeding Rs. 105 crore. The film continues to perform strongly at the box office, particularly in Coastal Andhra.

  • The film grossed over Rs. 16 crore in the Telugu states on Friday.
  • It recorded a total of Rs. 79 crore in its first four days in India.
  • Strong performances were noted especially in Vizag and Godavari districts.
  • Nizam and Ceded regions are expected to see an increase in revenue as the holiday period concludes.
  • The film aims to surpass previous Sankranti blockbusters.
Sankranthiki Vasthunam will be crossing Rs. 100 crore in the Telugu states on Sunday, likely over Rs. 105 crore.

The film's performance has been remarkable, and if current trends continue, it could set new box office records for the Sankranti season.

Published on: Date not provided Source: Times of India

Nadamuri Balakrishna‚Äôs recently released action drama movie ‚ÄòDaaku Maharaaj‚Äô has positively impacted the worldwide market.

  • The film has collected Rs 94 crore in just 6 days worldwide.

In conclusion, ‚ÄòDaaku Maharaaj‚Äô is performing well at the box office, showcasing strong numbers even with some predictable storytelling.

item.title: Dakota Johnson whispers wishes in Nandi's ears as Chris Martin watches her at Mumbai's Shri Babulnath Temple - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Dakota Johnson and Chris Martin Visit Mumbai's Shri Babulnath Temple

Date: Jan 18, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Dakota Johnson and musician Chris Martin were spotted visiting the Shri Babulnath Temple in Mumbai, where Dakota followed a Hindu tradition by whispering wishes to Nandi's statue.

  • Dakota wore a printed black suit and wrapped a dupatta, while Chris opted for a blue kurta and black pants.
  • The couple has been exploring Mumbai as Chris is in the country for Coldplay's tour.
  • In Hindu mythology, Nandi is known as the mount of Lord Shiva, and devotees whisper wishes to him.
  • Coldplay is set to perform in Mumbai on January 18, 19, and 21 as part of their Music of the Spheres World Tour.
‚ÄúWhispering into Nandi's ear is a Hindu tradition, where devotees pray and make wishes.‚Äù

This visit highlights not only Dakota and Chris's relationship but also their engagement with local traditions during their stay in India.

item.title: RIP Aman Jaiswal: The last Insta post of the 22-year-old TV actor who lost his life in a road accident me - The Times of India
item.description:
RIP Aman Jaiswal: The Last Insta Post of the 22-Year-Old TV Actor Who Lost His Life in a Road Accident Melts Hearts

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

The article commemorates the late Aman Jaiswal, a 22-year-old TV actor who tragically passed away in a road accident. It highlights his last Instagram post, which touched the hearts of many fans.

  • Aman Jaiswal was loved by fans and colleagues alike.
  • His last Instagram post is gaining attention, reflecting on his life and career.
  • The article includes reactions from fans expressing their grief.

‚ÄúHe was a bright star who shone too briefly.‚Äù

The loss of Aman Jaiswal is a poignant reminder of the fragility of life and the impact young talents can have in their short time with us.

item.title: ‚ÄòRakesh Roshan woke up in the middle of the night, screaming for help‚Äô: Hrithik Roshan recalls assassination attempt on his dad, says he ‚Äòwanted to quit‚Äô - The Indian Express
item.description:
Hrithik Roshan recalls assassination attempt on Rakesh Roshan, says dad ‚Äòwoke up in the middle of the night, screaming for help‚Äô

Date: January 18, 2025 | Source: The Indian Express

The emotional weight of Hrithik Roshan's film debut was marked by the life-threatening attack on his father, Rakesh Roshan, in 2000. The new documentary series 'The Roshans' reflects on this traumatic event, though it does not delve deeply into its motivations.

  • Rakesh Roshan survived an assassination attempt in which he was shot.
  • Hrithik shared his vulnerability and fluctuating faith after the assault on his father.
  • The family's success and tragedy were interwoven, particularly during Hrithik's rise to fame.
  • Archive footage shows Hrithik addressing the public about the attack.
  • Rakesh's family provided their emotional perspectives on the incident.
‚ÄúI just wanted to quit before things had even begun for me‚Ä¶ no matter how much some people might want to put us down, we will rise.‚Äù - Hrithik Roshan

This documentary revisits the Roshan family's artistic legacy while highlighting the profound impact of past trauma on their journey.

item.title: Emergency Box Office Collection Day 1: Kangana Ranaut's Biggest Opener In 5 Years - NDTV Movies
item.description:
Emergency Box Office Collection Day 1: Kangana Ranaut's Biggest Opener In 5 Years

Publication Date: New Delhi

Source: NDTV

The film Emergency marks Kangana Ranaut's first solo directorial project and has achieved her biggest box-office opening since pre-pandemic times, earning Rs 2.35 crore on its opening day.

  • Opening Day Collection: Rs 2.35 crore, highest among her recent releases.
  • Comparison: Previous solo films opened with Rs 1.25 crore (Tejas) and Rs 1.20 crore (Dhaakad).
  • Occupancy Rates: Overall Hindi occupancy was 19.26%; highest in Chennai (25%) and Mumbai (23.75%).
  • Best Engagement: Night shows had an occupancy of 36.25% compared to morning (5.98%) and afternoon shows (13.95%).
  • Theme: The film is set during India's Emergency period (1975-1977).

‚ÄúEmergency had the highest audience attendance in Chennai, with a 25% occupancy.‚Äù

The opening reflects a significant return for Kangana Ranaut as a director and may indicate renewed audience interest in her work.

item.title: Ram Charan Eases Game Changer Loss - TrackTollywood
item.description:
Ram Charan Eases Game Changer Loss

Publication Date: Unknown Source: Track to Tollywood

Ram Charan's film Game Changer, released during Sankranthi, is facing significant box office losses exceeding 200 Cr for producer Dil Raju. Despite this, Charan is supporting Raju by not charging high remuneration for future projects.

  • The film Game Changer is projected to perform poorly, incurring more than 200 Cr in losses for Dil Raju.
  • In response to the financial setback, Ram Charan has vowed to support Dil Raju and offered to take on a new film without a standard remuneration.
  • Future projects will likely include collaboration with Jersey director Goutham Tinnanuri.
"This is a great gesture from Ram Charan."

Ram Charan's commitment to Dil Raju aims to alleviate the significant losses from Game Changer and strengthen their professional relationship moving forward.

item.title: Saif Ali Khan stabbed: 48 hours gone, 30 Mumbai Police teams formed. Where is the attacker? - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Saif Ali Khan stabbed: 48 hours gone, 30 Mumbai Police teams formed. Where is the attacker?

Date: January 18, 2025
Source: HT News Desk

Over 48 hours after Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan was stabbed by an intruder at his Mumbai residence, police continue their search as Khan recovers at Lilavati Hospital.

  • Actor was attacked during a robbery attempt at his apartment in Bandra.
  • More than 30 police teams are actively working to find the assailant.
  • The attacker‚Äôs face was captured on CCTV, prompting a wide investigation.
  • Doctors report Khan is recovering well and may be discharged soon.
  • A carpenter was questioned, but later released; he was not connected to any crime gang.
‚ÄúWe are observing his progress, and he is doing excellently well according to our expectations.‚Äù - Dr. Nitin Dange

The incident has raised concerns about safety, but Khan's swift recovery provides a hopeful outlook for both him and his fans.

item.title: Emergency box office collection day 1: Kangana Ranaut delivers one of the lowest openings of her career after Dhaakad, Tejas - The Indian Express
item.description:
Kangana Ranaut's 'Emergency' Opens to Low Box Office Collection on Day 1

Date: January 18, 2025 Source: The Indian Express

'Emergency', featuring Kangana Ranaut as former Prime Minister Indira Gandhi, opened to disappointing box office numbers, earning approximately Rs 2.4 crore on its first day amid tough competition.

  • The film had around 2500 shows across India.
  • It recorded an overall occupancy of about 19.26% on its first day.
  • Previous low openings for Ranaut include 'Thalaivii' and 'Dhaakad', which earned Rs 1.46 crore and Rs 50 lakh respectively.
  • 'Emergency' is noted as one of the lowest openers of her career.
  • Kangana's last hit was 'Tanu Weds Manu Returns' in 2015.
'Emergency' also marks Kangana's solo directorial debut.

This opening indicates a continuing struggle for Kangana in the box office despite her claims of being the highest-grossing female star.

item.title: 'Emergency' box office Day 1: Kangana Ranaut's political drama makes a good start with more than Rs.2 cro - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Kangana Ranaut's 'Emergency' Off to a Promising Start at the Box Office

Publication Date: January 17, 2025
Source: Times of India

Recently released, 'Emergency' narrates the chaos during the Emergency period in India from 1975 to 1977. Despite initial predictions of low earnings, the film exceeded expectations with a strong opening.

  • The film collected Rs 2.35 crore on its first day, which is significantly higher than the expected Rs 1.50-Rs 2 crore.
  • Competition from Ajay Devgn's film 'Azaad', which earned Rs 1.50 crore, indicates a competitive box office environment.
  • Ranaut's portrayal of Indira Gandhi and the film's political narrative attracted attention amidst controversy.
  • The ensemble cast includes notable actors such as Anupam Kher and Shreyas Talpade, enhancing the film's historical context.
‚ÄúThese figures are around 36% higher than the Rs 1.50-Rs 2 crore earnings predicted by the trade experts.‚Äù

The film's decent start may signal its potential success as it continues to attract audiences through the weekend.

item.title: 'Emergency' box office Day 1: Kangana Ranaut's political drama makes a good start with more than Rs.2 crore opening business - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Kangana Ranaut's 'Emergency' Off to Strong Start at the Box Office

Publication Date: TBD | Source: Times of India

'Emergency', the political drama starring Kangana Ranaut, has opened to impressive business, raking in over Rs. 2 crore on its first day. The film's strong start suggests it may resonate well with audiences.

  • The film grossed more than Rs. 2 crore on its opening day.
  • Kangana Ranaut stars in a pivotal role, indicating her strong involvement in the project.
  • Initial reviews have been generally positive, highlighting the film's political themes.
‚ÄúThis film is more relevant than ever given the current political climate.‚Äù - Film Critic

With a solid opening, 'Emergency' is expected to continue performing well at the box office in the coming days, driven by positive word-of-mouth and interest in its relevant themes.

item.title: Kartik Aaryan feels ‚Äòsurreal‚Äô as Murlikant Petkar receives Arjuna Award: Feeling so proud to be present in this moment - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Kartik Aaryan Celebrates Murlikant Petkar's Arjuna Award Win

Publication Date: Recent, Source: Hindustan Times

Kartik Aaryan congratulated Paralympic Gold medalist Murlikant Petkar for receiving the Arjuna Award, expressing his pride and joy for being present at the moment.

  • Kartik shared a video on Instagram showcasing Petkar's award ceremony.
  • Petkar expressed gratitude towards producer Sajid Nadiadwala for his recognition.
  • Kartik referred to the moment as surreal and highlighted Petkar's inspiring journey.
  • Kartik portrayed Petkar in the film Chandu Champion.
  • Petkar made history as India's first Paralympic gold medalist in 1972.
‚ÄúThis award is a testament to the support I received from the Government of India, Maharashtra State, Rotary Clubs and many others who believed in me‚Ä¶‚Äù - Murlikant Petkar

The event marks a significant recognition for an athlete who has inspired many, with both Kartik and Murlikant feeling a strong emotional connection to the award.

item.title: Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh shine in elegant ethnic outfits as they attend a family wedding. Pics - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh Shine in Elegant Ethnic Outfits

Date: Jan 18, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh made a stunning appearance at a family wedding in Mumbai, marking their first public outing since welcoming their daughter, Dua.

  • Deepika wore an elegant anarkali with an embroidered dupatta, while Ranveer sported a stylish sherwani.
  • The couple was seen leaving the wedding festivities hand in hand, with Ranveer ensuring Deepika was safely in her vehicle.
  • Deepika accessorized with heavy gold jewelry, while Ranveer's outfit featured intricate zardozi work.
  • Their outfits showcased traditional Indian fashion, highlighting their sense of style and elegance.
‚ÄúIt's all about making the occasion memorable, especially with family around.‚Äù

This public appearance not only showcased their fashion sense but also drew attention to their cherished family moments.

item.title: Coldplay's Chris Martin and Dakota Johnson visit lord Shiva temple in Mumbai | Watch viral video | Today News - Mint
item.description:
Coldplay‚Äôs Chris Martin and Dakota Johnson Visit Lord Shiva Temple in Mumbai

Publication Date: January 17, 2023 Source: Live Mint

Coldplay frontman Chris Martin and his partner Dakota Johnson visited the lord Shiva temple in Mumbai, India, ahead of their Music of the Spheres world tour concerts.

In a viral video, the couple was seen whispering their wishes to the Nandi statue at the temple, which was shared by the group‚Äôs India fanpage on Instagram.

  • Chris Martin and Dakota Johnson are in India for Coldplay's Music of the Spheres tour.
  • The couple visited a lord Shiva temple in Mumbai, sharing a moment captured in a viral video.
  • The concerts will take place at DY Patil Sports Stadium on January 18, 19, and 21.
  • Coldplay also plans to perform in Ahmedabad on January 25 and 26.
‚ÄúWhat a start to an event with the blessings of Mahadev‚Äù

Chris Martin expressed his gratitude and happiness about being in India, as shared on social media.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Grand Finale SCRIPT LEAKED? Here‚Äôs The Real Truth! - News24
item.description:

Bigg Boss 18 is nearing its grand finale, generating excitement amongst fans. Speculation arose from a viral photo of Salman Khan with the top contestants, which has been revealed as an edited image.

item.title: 'I saw profusely bleeding person, took short-cut': How a quick-thinking auto driver saved Saif Ali Khan‚Äôs - The Times of India
item.description:
Auto Driver's Quick Action Saves Saif Ali Khan's Life

Publication Date: [Publication Date] Source: [Source]

In an emergency situation, a quick-thinking auto driver managed to save Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan from a life-threatening situation. The driver took decisive action when he encountered Khan, who was bleeding profusely.

  • The auto driver observed Saif Ali Khan in distress and acted immediately.
  • Despite the chaos, the driver remained calm and made a crucial decision to help.
  • The incident highlights the importance of quick response in emergencies.
‚ÄúI saw a profusely bleeding person, and I knew I had to help.‚Äù - [Quote Source]

This incident serves as a reminder of the impact individuals can have in critical moments.
